item.name: Proxysql cluster number of mysql_query_rules versions
Proxysql cluster number of mysql_servers versions
Proxysql cluster number of mysql_users versions
Proxysql cluster number of proxysql_servers versions

trigger_prototype.name: Proxysql backend MySQL server {#SERVERNAME}:{#SERVERPORT} is not ONLINE
Proxysql high connection latency to backend MySQL server {#SERVERNAME}:{#SERVERPORT}
Proxysql large number of server connection errors to backend MySQL server {#SERVERNAME}:{#SERVERPORT}
Proxysql {#USERNAME} user frontend connections near maximum

trigger.name: Proxysql cluster out of sync. More than one version of mysql_query_rules exists in cluster
Proxysql cluster out of sync. More than one version of mysql_servers exists in cluster
Proxysql cluster out of sync. More than one version of mysql_users exists in cluster
Proxysql cluster out of sync. More than one version of proxysql_servers exists in cluster
Proxysql large number of client connection errors
